pages.text: If you have not done so already: To access FTB Quests, open your inventory by pressing E and clicking the book on the very top left corner of the game window. $(br2)With that out of the way, I would also highly recommend not wearing the Ring of the Seven Curses until you are ready to suffer.

Read the tooltip very carefully. This ring becomes permanently attached to you. $(br2)There is also another accessory that you arrived with, it's called the Enigmatic Amulet. $(br2)Continue on to the next page.
Now, prepare yourself by getting some wood by punching down some trees before night hits. $(br2)Let's just say the night has become significantly more dangerous.

There is no gravestone mod. Instead, you will have this amulet which transforms into a vessel that stores your items upon death. $(br2)Be careful though, if you die again before re-acquiring the vessel, it will shatter and drop your items.
